main event: A strange, unidentified object thought to be a flying saucer was observed by approximately 500 people in Brasilia, Brazil on November 7, 1958.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 15 meters in diameter.
The object came back to its base without any sound or trail.
The object was flying at an altitude of about 12,000 meters.
An Air Force plane went up to 3,000 meters and observed the object.
The object was described as a 'celestial object' by the witnesses.
sighted object: a strange, unidentified object thought to be a flying saucer
